review_text: We like it. Worked well for our chriatmas tree.
Two Stars. To tight on my head.
Good stuff. Bottle lid was broken 😒. Other than that, good product.
Not returnable and it came the jar was open.big mess. Wasted my money. Couldn't use it, it was open and a mess not returnable
Three Stars. kind of plastic-y
Love. Best stuff ever.
Great brush. Great brush
For 10.99 it's small. Really small

Works on most / new stains. I already use this brand’s odor eliminator and detergent which i love so I decided to try the stain remover. First time using it. Top row of collage pics are before and bottom row is after. Worked well on some old stains but didn’t work on others. Didn’t get a before pic of the pink & white romper but it worked on an old stain that was on there.
Three Stars. its ok... not what I really wanted
One Star. Get a prescription. Much safer and pure.
Three Stars. It doesn't fit our teapots so we have to fit it in sideways.

Short life!. I bought this brush curling iron 5 months ago.  It was perfect...  at first.  After a couple of months it started losing the plastic bristles a few at a time.... then a lot each time I used it.  The whole reason I wanted the bristles was to keep from burning my skin.  Now most of the bristles have broken off and after a couple of bad burns on my forehead I gave up on it.

Dead spot on screen now....5 weeks after warranty expired.. Used only to listen to books at night...barely used. Am dissatisfied with this product. I have hardly used this.

On the right side of the screen there is a dead zone about the size of a business card. Only found out when i went to play a game.
Works well but smells like chemicals. Works well, but it smells like strong chemicals, which makes me a little nervous.
Works fantastic, I think it would fit almost any dryer .... Works fantastic, I think it would fit almost any dryer because it's flexible and molds to the shape of your dryer.
Boxes crushed. Three of the Kleenex boxes in the case were utterly crushed.
Love these. These are the best
Five Stars. great product thanks
Four Stars. works very well

Great stuff! Works awesome on all baby. Great stuff! Works awesome on all baby, kid and adult stains. Formula, spit up, baby food and leaky diapers. Works better than any other stain remover I've tried!
It is ok. This product does not leave a white residue like got to be clue spray but does not hold better than the got to be glue spray
works. works perfect!
Definitely worth buying. Better then 3.00 dollars a box
Two Stars. Too small

Poor battery life. I bought this so I could stream movies and play games during a flight. It works great for streaming videos but playing games is difficult unless the battery is fully charged. Once the battery charge gets below about 40 % the touch screen becomes erratic, for example moving, or not moving pieces when the screen is touched. No time to aim or adjust, it just fires randomly.

No longer worth it. I have to agree with the other recent reviews. The smaller, flimsier version just isn't worth it anymore. They fall apart just trying to pull one out of the package, much less actually using them. The smaller size also means you have to use more. I will not be buying any more and I cannot recommend it to anyone.
One Star. They don't tell you that it says on the label that it is not to be taken internally.
Wish there were more tissues per box.. They don’t last long.
Four Stars. Worked great!
Flimsy material. Appears it could easily snag on velcro. Item was received torn, flimsy and dirty. Appears that it would snag very easily on velcro. Cannot recommend. Returning
Like it. Like it
the adjustable velcro is so long that it always get's .... the adjustable velcro is so long that it  always get's cut in the microfiber fabrics and rips everything apart, very cheap quality!
Love it!. Love this! Great value!
Not as good as the previous versions. The sound is too bassy, despite accessing the equalizer. Makes it hard to understand Alexa.
great. great

Great item, very handy. I recently acquired a flat iron and wanted clips like these to section and hold my daughter's hair while we used the flat iron. These are well-made in friendly colors, and they're nicely curved rather than straight. The jaws hold well but aren't too strong. Really an ideal solution and at a great price, too.
These cups work good. Sometimes we have to hold down the cover .... These cups work good.  Sometimes we have to hold down the cover after the cup is inserted, but don't mind it.

Very pretty tiara. I really like it. My daughter said it was too heavy, but she is picky about tiaras. She also prefers the headband kind instead of the combs on this kind. It is beautiful and looks well made.
Only lasted 9 months. They just stopped working last week.  I don't know why.  Even cheap ear buds should last longer than 9 months.
Two Stars. The fabric felt horrible.

NOPE. Sorry but NOT the best cleaner. Leaves mat with a film that I can’t get rid of without running a hose on my mat or putting it in the shower. Does not work as advertised. Seems to be a little t of false advertising these days on Amazon.
Ehh. Honestly not a great buy. Don’t believe it has the capability of downloading HBO max - boo. I use my Apple TV way more.
Best sprayer ever!. This is the best water bottle ever. It delivers a constant spray and makes getting your hair wet super easy. A must have.
Don't waste your money.. Lousy quality... Lousy quality.. The necklace is ok but the pendant is not wearable. The stone is glued in crooked so I will just throw that part away..
Hard to Find. I have a hard time finding heated curling brushes these days, and this one works well.  I do wish it had automatic shut-off, but other than that it is fine.
Five Stars. good
NO GOOGLE PLAY STORE APPS ALLOWED. This has too much bloatware and IT DOES NOT IMPORT apps from Google Play Store.
Five Stars. Main ingredient in my diy juice for over two years
awesome!. just what I wanted!
NOT FOR KEURIG 2.0. The description didn't state that this cup won't fit a Keurig 2.0. Was easy to return for an account credit.
I guess it works as advertised. I have used it on my shoulders for light pain and discomfort and it seems to be working. not sure if there are any long term effects but i would recommend it.
Necklace. Very pretty, have had many compliments on it.  I gave it 4 stars because when I where it there is something on the back clasp or in that area that keeps making my neck itch.
You’ll never regret having it in your life!!. This  Echo Dot was a gift from my son to help me navigate new technology.  BEST GIFT EVER!  How did I ever live without it!!
One Star. These are not worth anything. They did not last but one day with my 7 year old daughter.
love it.. Great sound, works great.
Five Stars. Works great!
Love! Smells awesome. Love!  Smells awesome.  I do not have to use conditioner.

I love these except for the little hard fiber things that come off. These work great and do the job. The only reason I’m taking away a star is because the hard fiber parts around the edge of the round will flake off onto your skin and that’s really annoying. They get on your face and if they don’t make it on your face you find them all over your counter.
Love. Love

Perfect use with single serve paper coffee filters.. Fantastic product. I use this with paper filters, it fills the filter paper, and then tamps the coffee down need to tamp the coffee down to get the right portion. Love it!
Cheap quality. Cheap quality
One Star. save your money, does not stick to shower floor.
One Star. Very thin and cheaply made.
Worked OK until it snapped in two.. Worked OK until it snapped in two.
You get what you pay for.. The quality isn't that great but its expected because of the price.
Five Stars. I purchased these for added memory in cell phones.  Now there is enough memory for photos or videos.
Five Stars. I love this! It works well and smells nice. I practice hot yoga so this cleaner is a must!

Cool but nothing to write home about. There is a coolness factor but she loses connection all the time and really doesn't do it anything besides try to get me to subscribe to more services.
Not next happy with her.
Works on new stains, but not old ones. It has worked fairly well on some stains, but for stains that have been sitting there for a bit already this does not work well and I had to use OxiClean.
Amazon Smart Plug. Love It!!
Bath wrap. Terrific quality. Just as described and promptly delivered.
Get what you pay for. Broke as soon as we put it on.
Two Stars. These are ok but overpriced for what they are.

fantastic product. this is honestly my first time knowing about echo products and this speaker exceeds all of my needs. the music sounds great. jazz sounds great, gospel music sounds great, R&B sounds fantastic… you won’t be disappointed.

works very well. I bought these to stop the sludge that was appearing in each cup, that work.  It does take a few cups to get used to inserting the filter....and the grounds can flow over the top but for the most part this does what I expected.
Works as intended. Works like it's supposed to, can't complain and I think that's a good review right there!
Great buy.. It works really well.
Very nice smell, not pungent. I like this cleaner more than the last one I purchased.  The lavender smell is not pungent, just enough to give a nice aroma.  Cleans my mat very well.
Works great. Works great, can make an entire pot of tea
Sadness. Pretty but poor quality. Broke the first time I used it.

Not good for my needs. Not good, SUPER bulky and is huge! I tried them in case maybe they just looked too big, but nope, they were way too big for my kitchen and were more like a speed bump. I threw them out.
not worth the price. From ten dollars for 100, a price that was in effect for many many years, they now charge fifty dollars for the same thing.
Good product..good hold. Great hold
Would recommend. Decent product. It gets the job done as far as cleaning and has a pumice stone. I like it.

MAYBE THIS IS THE CRUCIAL INGREDIENT. I don't know. The crucial test of what they do and how well they do it seems to be that you can heat up the remainder of your pot of coffee later in the day or in the evening, and still you won't get any bitter or acid taste. Is that it?

What do the other Amazons say? I say, "Works for me."
Trusted Kleenex. Holes in kleenex when blowing nose not absorbent
easy feet. I do not recommend this product.  There is no "well" for the soap, the suction cups do not stick to my tile and the pumice stone arrived broken.  All-in-all, not a good $25 investment.

This is my favourite! I cant find it at the local shop .... Dreft gets MOST stains out, even on adult clothes! Ive used tons of products hoping to get stains out..... This is my favourite! I cant find it at the local shop anymore so will continue to order it on amazon

Works great for softening Eucalyptus leaves. I bought this to soak Eucalyptus leaves in for use in arrangements.  Works great - you can find detailed instructions online.  Also good as a dry skin moisturizer - I like that it's all natural!
Not fine mist. The mist is not at all ultra fine, and it is not continuous either
works. I got this to help with a edible tincture and it works very well.  I must say that a small portion goes a long way.
Not good. Defected product … does not connect to Alexa
Two Stars. They are headphones that perform very poorly with regards to other headphones I have purchased from Amazon.
Does not work!. This does not get stains out. Blow outs, spit up or Breast milk doesn’t work at all.
Hair brush. Ok brush, just too large!
Never works on mine. My eyebrows are really fine and sparse. It didn’t work.

CHEAP!. Received mine in record time but ½ the size of bonafide Keurig filters.Took two filters to provide marginal use (½ the size equals ¼ the filtering benefit.
This was a clear case of "you get what you pay for"
Doesn't repel bugs as well as I would like... Doesn't repel bugs as well as I would like... Keep something better, like 40% deet, nearby in case things get hairy.
Works as expected.. Purchased this card for my LG G Vista 2 cell phone.. It fits fine and is working properly.
Two Stars. Its ok

Love it. If you're tired of spray bottles that soak your hair, your shirt, and leave water running down your face every time you try and wet your hair for styling, this is the product for you. I know that sounds corny, but it is a really good product.
Runny nose corrector. Need to be softer
👍🏾. I had a problem with Netflix. I don't if it's the app or the stick.

Quality this time is low. I've gotten this lol from this brand before and love it. I use it on my face as my sole product, and my skin is radiant.

This time, though, the product is unsatisfactory. It smells and looks like rancid almond oil. It does not have the color or smell of pumpkin seed oil in the least.
Perfect. Does what it is supposed to do - a perfect indicator as long as you remember to change it.
Great holding hairspray. I love this hair spray, phenomenal hold for my fine thin hair.

Interference with external bluetooth DAC. Instead of connecting directly to the speaker with Bluetooth, I wanted to connect my phone via bluetooth to an Arcam miniBLINK which would connect to the speaker via 3.5mm. Unfortunately, there was interference and the speaker made a constant high-pitch sound. Not the most common use-case for this speaker, but I'm disappointed that it didn't work.
Terrific. The port for power isn't what I would like to have
One Star. The diffuser collapses easily. If I could give it a negative star I would.
Bad quality. Not Recommended
Made cheap. These are cheaply made and I received the actual package ripped with the teeth of the clamps broken off
One Star. Useless.
Ours lasted 15 months. Ours lasted only 15 months
Faster drainage. The coffee goes through these papers faster than the white Melitta papers. That might make coffee less flavourful

I had to get my pads replaced. this turned my glass pads orange, they were very nice and said they would refund the cost have not noticed if they did though they also said this was the first time they heard of this problem. So not sure if I was the one unlucky one or not, I had to get my pads replaced
Not sturdy enough to hold itself well. Flimsy.  Not study enough for the area I want.  Unfortunately I didn't send back in time. A waste for me. Sitting in the original packaging,  not being used.

Does NOT Pair with Alexa Echo!. I tried everything humanly possible and I cannot get this remote to pair with Alexa Echo!......Amazon for whatever reason could not figure it out after over an hour in chat!
An interesting encounter!. Works fine in a limited way for my needs, feel like I have to yell or at least raise my voice to get a response. I do ask her to sing, she always declines.
Had to return. Had to return. Water went through much too fast.
Five Stars. good fit and value
Great value for the money. Don't expect high-level spec from this item.  This is all about value and weight.  I think with that in mind it is a very nice tablet.

Works. Works as described.  Bit expensive for the time it lasts and you would think for this kind of money it'll be cleaned.  Nope.  Have to waste a whole tray (and a day) of making black/gray ice before ice can be used.
waste of money. this product was a waste of money.  the pumice stone fell out as well as all the bristles and the suction cups after a few moves would not go back into the holes they belonged in.
Nice. Love it

Body fat calculation. The scale is a fine piece of engineering. However, the body fat calculation is very lacking,  I am approximately 28.5 % body fat and the scale consistently registers 38%. It may seem like I'm exaggerating, but I am not. I've kept the scale and simply translate the body fat.  I will contact Fitbit with my concern.
Buy. Good product
Bad purchase for me. Bad purchase for me...made my coffee taste nasty.  I know it was the filter because the third pot I made I used a sheet of Bounty paper towel instead and my coffee was yummy.
Four Stars. A little more pricey than I would have liked, but it works perfectly.
No slip. Definitely keeps my glasses from slipping, now if I can just remember to use it daily.
Five Stars. love it
Too pricey. Way too much to pay for a single filter
So happy to have found this. So happy to have found this!  It's the only thing that works on my curly hair to "straighten" it.  Very hard to come by. Great Value!

CHEAPER THAN THE OEM STORE. Bought this item due to its cost and frustration received whenever ordering from the OEM Frigidaire store online where they misplace my orders and have no clue of what is going on.  These guys fulfilled the order faster, cheaper and with no hassel.

It leaves mat slick.. Looks and smells just like described. However, it did leave my mat quite slick for a while, which it's listed as not doing. I even rubbed it extra times to try to get rid of the slickness. It didn't work. It wore off in time.
I can't give this a good review because it makes the mat slick and a potential hazard of injury by going too far too fast.
Didn’t work. The first few times of using was good but then it started acting up. It wouldn’t spray out anymore & would leak everytime I traveled with it.
Perfect. Cheap and quick thank you very much

Not really textured, as expected. Ordered these because they were to be textured cotton rounds, making eye makeup remove easier and more completely. The "texture" does not suffice to even be labeled as such. They are soft and absorbent if that’s what you are looking for, however
👍. Fits perfectly
Defective. REALLY BAD QUALITY! It worked for two weeks and then clogged up. Water dispenser no longer works when filter is installed. Must be a manufacturing defect.
Three Stars. Good product.
Works great. Works very well and much cheaper than alternative
A good addition to my room. I CAN TURN MY LIGGHTS ON AND OFF AND TELL IT TO PLAY MUSIC WOW AND IT FARTS FOR ME GOOD PRODUCT GET ONE

Great Scale, heafty price. I got this scale because I started using the fit bit one.  While it's great and more accurate than my previous scale, it's pretty pricey. I'm not sure it was worth the price.
Very pleased.. Should have upgraded a long time ago.  Terrific battery life.
Great. Granddaughter loves it sound is great
They sent me natural. I ordered the white bleached filters and received the natural which gives off a faint unpleasant taste to the coffee. Will not order these again.
Four Stars. Works as expected.
Great tasting and easy brewing.. I love my aeropress... because it is just right for a few cups of coffee that do not go stale in a over heated pot.

I have thick hair that is a couple inches past .... I have thick hair that is a couple inches past my shoulders. These clips don't do much for my hair at all, they can only hold a little at a time and are slippery. I keep them around just for coloring my hair.
Best Hairspray Ever!. Doesn't stink like other brands and holds my hair on place without looking sticky.
Dont waste your money. The product showed up broken inside a destroyed box.  Only got a star because I cant give negative stars.
Won’t spray!!!. This is not the first time I’ve ordered this product but neither bottle sprays and i can’t return them nor can I get a hold of anyone at AMAZON to replace them or refund my money
These were affordable and very natural but since the length .... These were affordable and very natural but since the length isn't varied you can't really even tell that you're wearing lashes.
No cable love fire stick. I don't have cable on my daughter's tv so i connected the fire stick to her tv and she loves it she can watch whatever she wants to. It works perfectly on her tv.
Crystals pop off easily or are missing.. Looks lovely, except for a few missing crystals. But WOW, the remaining crystals pop off easily! Just ridiculous.

White cord?. I enjoy the electronics part, but why do you make a black product with a white power cord?

Makes no sense
Very good product.. Does a great job cleaning.
Four Stars. As described in listing.  Arrived quickly.
didn't see much difference from using the Skin-So-Soft and this .... didn't see much difference from using the Skin-So-Soft and this product.  I will just use the Skin-So-Soft in the future.
Best hair product - I’ve used it for years. Great hair spray.  It keeps my difficult to style hair in check with just a whisper of spray.  I’ve relied on it for years.  Great product!
Material is not durable. The diffuser ripped after the second time I used it
Four Stars. No complaints.

Not impressed. I know this is a kids product but the size of the wipe is almost comical and they are so thin and disintegrate with no force at all. I will not purchase again or recommend anyone to buy the product

It is a piece of junk.. Very disappointed.  I had all kinds of trouble getting it hooked up to the internet.  Once I got it hooked up the signel coming from the Fire I had to stand over my motum.  All my other devices worked fine.  It is a piece of junk.
Does the job. could be louder but works great

Major Downgrade - Buy 3rd Generation. This is such a downgrade from previous models, it’s scary. This one is so bad that the other echos in my house will pick up my voice while this one doesn’t when I’m in the same room as it.
Don't recommend using this with Chemex. I've been using a straw with this to allow hot air to escape.  I prefer the Chemex filter or the stainless steel filter more than this.

Kleenex. Great quality. . .

Grade: A

Nice. Works wonderful

Works fine. Box was slightly damaged and the bottle itself had some scratches on it, but it still works fine. Not exactly "new" though.
Four Stars. Doesn't spray correctly.
Four Stars. Seems to work

Wow. I'm really surprised these work. I wear them when I go out with friends and have found it much easier to hear them over the music, besides the music being much more tolerable. My ears aren't ringing when I leave and take them out, so my migraines aren't triggered as easily. Very happy with this purchase, I just wish they were a tiny bit more effective with the music.

Useful. I really like the different holes for makeup brushes. It's a very solid piece. Comes in 3 pieces with paper sticker over entire piece of both sides. It comes was a pain to remove. Luckily I have nails.
Four Stars. I fell, had nerve, muscle pain. Tried this, it helps, i could sleep

User for 2 decades. I've been wearing contact lenses since 1973.  This product works better than anything I've ever tried, particularly when your lenses are grimy from pollution and irritants.  The generics are fine, but the Alcon brand is really the best.
As advertised. Shipping was exceptionally fast.. As advertised.  Shipping was exceptionally fast.

It kinda works?. This works, just not as well as i expected given the glowing reviews.  It doesn't hold my glasses in place for long but it holds them in place longer than nothing.  This is likely because the wax won't stay in place on my nose pads.  The wax keeps sliding off the pads.  Also, its a little difficult to apply.  It would benefit from a longer, narrower tube than the current design.
Worked for less than a year. Suddenly stopped working. Amazon refuses to refund or replace if it’s a month after purchase date. Don’t waste your money.
Best Wash Cloth. Best bathing cloth ever.  This is such a satisfying exfoliating cloth, and is the perfect size.  You will need much less soap to get a great lather from these.
Disappointed. It seemed to work great for one minute but the pressure went way down before I even got clear water to come through.
Worth the price. Can’t complain about these. Well worth the price. Better than average sound.

Alexa has problems understanding at times.. Alexa has problems understanding may times. We have names for lights etc. Sometimes we have to repeat the name several times before alexa understands. Sometimes I think alexa is getting tired of my voice and ignores me like my wife.
not worth the momey. got it because i like my brand of coffee, when i brewed first cup it was brown water.I like strong coffee don't spend your money.

Thin, light coffee.. They're fine, if you like Chemex coffee.  Turns out I like my coffee better brewed with thinner filters, so I won't be buying another box after this one.  You don't need the whole glass brewing gizmo, you can use these in a pourover rig.

Work well for my toddler. These work well for my toddler.  I bought the kind in the plastic case before and they were horrible as they dried out before we got through half a box.  These soft tubs are much better at staying wet.
Manufacturing error. After the first two pullsthe rest came in a ball.it would appear to be a manufacturing error. Other then that appear to be ok. We will see what the next box brings for a followup
PRETTY 👌. Sorta too big for some spots on ove but overall a really  good biy
Five Stars. Works great.
Good Price. Does the job and the price is right

I cannot use it at all.. It arrived quickly. It seems to be in decent shape. But it smells like pure gasoline. As soon as I opened the bag I had to drop the product and take a couple steps back.
I am putting it outside for now. I am not even sure if it is a fire hazard :-) I will update this review if anything changes. This product is completely unusable upon delivery
No. Did nothing extra for me.  Granted I had my doubts but thought I would give it a try on stubborn stains - no help to me.
Wish it held more. I love this bottle. Use it everyday just to mist my hair with my moisturizing concoction. But I wish it held more water.
Awesome reader, if you buy it right. This thing is great. Don't buy the bundles though. You get screwed out of deals. Start with the individual device then "customize".
Sanitary. Very handy
It works great. It works great,  I'm just having trouble getting use to it. I have a little trouble being as quick & precise as I would like, but I'll get there.

Don't bother.... Worst foot cleaner out there. Heavy and clunky.  Buy the suction cup type you can hang on the outside (or inside) of the tub. I did not buy this on Amazon, I bought it at a drugstore and returned it the next day.

Great sound. This is amazing.  The sound quality is so clear and wonderful.  We hook it up to the computer and can hear music all though the house.
Disappointed. They take way to long to turn one.
GREAT PRODUCT. Does just what it says it does. Love it. Gonna order another one right now.
Four Stars. good product , do the work
Bad. They're splitting in half and really rough
A very good value, will likely buy again. As expected, nothing exciting to say about a filter. A very good value, will likely buy again.
Great hold for short "messy" styles.. Love this hairspray ••• holds all day, can be layered for extra body. Best hairspray I’ve used in years!
Five Stars. best stuff every! only product that has worked on my kids!

I dare a company to send me a curler that works better!. 110% recommend! Nothing curls my hair ever BUT bed head curlers! And it stays for days. The pics are from yesturday curls I didn't do anything but wake up and toss it in a pony tail. Do yourself a huge favor and get it!!!!
Did not make bigger bubbles. Used for huge bubble recipe. Did not work well for that.
Broken in 20 minutes. What we ordered was to be GOLD and it came in Rose Gold. We didn’t have time to send it back and it broke within 20 minutes of wearing it.
Not for 2.0. My kids have one. Works great but, not in my new 2.0 machine. They do not tell you that until you read the directions
One Star. in opposite to what the image shows, the item is fully opaque and not transparent.
Yes. Yes

Excellent product and great followup!. Just started using this, but I am very impressed. I had some issues on my scalp that I've bee trying to clear up for years, (yes Years!).  I dropped this castor oil on the spots at night with a q-tip.  The problem has completely gone away.  Thank YOU!

Not for Keureg 2.0 K550. I have a Keureg 2.0 K550. Doesn't work with the filters. I tried several times and it overflows or I got the pressure error. Probably giving to my father in law since his 1.0 can use the filters.
Get a bigger screen. It's very small ..didn't meet my expectations..very disappointed..

DOES NOT FIT ALL KEURIG COFFEE MAKERS. The produce looks well made and it might work, but not with our Keurig K-Cup machine. Utterly useless. So, for the product maker, don't say things that are not true.  Not expensive enough to merit sending back.
Worked great keeping mosquitoes away. Worked great keeping mosquitoes away

Mine smelled like house paint. I don't understand how anybody could like this oil. It smells exactly like house paint. I expected earthy, herbal chamomile and got house paint. Had a couple of other people sanity check my nose - they both agreed it smelled like nothing but paint fumes. No idea.
Didn’t last. Did not work very well.
Didn’t work. I tried it on my baby’s onesies and it didn’t take off the stains at all

Kind of a waste of money. Doesn’t work once one’s face becomes oily. If you had a non-oily complexion it would probably work better but I don’t know that it would be as needed. I find it easier to just remove my glasses periodically to wipe my nose and the part of the frame that touches my nose. I don’t use it anymore.
Good product!. I gave it as a gift and she loves it!
Way over priced for what it is. Way over priced. Does what its supposed to do but way cheaper options out there.
Not worth it. Poor quality
Very Curly. Does exactly as it says. Makes my hair very curly! I have thin/finer hair so I do not need to leave it wrapped around as long to get curls.

Defective. Got this during the big Amazon shopping days. It got put on the shelf and forgotten about until a few years ago. So we opened it got everything plugged in and then the remote doesn't work so the whole thing is useless
One Star. Half of the clips were broken in the bag. Not worth sending back due to the delivery charge.

Masterpiece  wins!. Hard Head did not hold my curils like Masterpiece did, so I am going back to what works for my hair to lock in my long curls that lasts and looks great all day, even on a rainly day.
Randomly disconnects. Randomly disconnects.

Remove makeup or to use with a light cleanser or toner water to remove dirt off face. As advertised
Great to use with my toner wipes
Prefer the Unbleached. I prefer the unbleached - might be my imagination but the unbleached drains more quickly and doesn't, as some have written, have any different taste - none at all.
relaxed body. Nice product, doesn't give as tight a curl as and iron does but does lift the hair.

Does not fit your hand. This mouse is too small it does not fit the hand. They should have used the model with the marble in the middle to make a wireless mouse. Most of the Logitech products or good ,but this is a bad fit.
Warning. Speakers do not play at the same volume. Who knows how long they will even last if they come out of the box like that
It's okay for glam camping.. Good for car camping. Coffee didn't taste any more better than normal.
Five Stars. A+
It's good but not necessarily cheaper. It's good but I found out that nearby Asian markets have a cheaper price for the same product.

They work, but I'm not really fond of the result. To be honest, I'm not really using these any more.  They work to keep grinds out of the coffee cup, but they take some of the flavor out as well. I just use a bit coarser coffee to reduce the grinds in the cup rather than lose flavor.
GOOD!!. GOOD!!
